summary:
This is a replacer that fills in the holes in this armor with chain mail, making it worthy of the title \"heavy armor\". 

Now available in scalemail!

Requires Dragonborn DLC!
descriptionHtml:
This is a replacer that fills in the holes in this armor with chain mail, making it worthy of the title \"heavy armor\". This armor is supposed to look like silver but it looks like stormtrooper armor to me. Therefore, I shaded it to look like slightly tarnished silver using a slightly tarnished silver coin as a reference.

Includes male and female versions.


Feedback is welcomed, enjoy!

check out my other armor mods

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24593]\"Ancestral Helms\"[/url]
